<s>general in nothing but the independence 
and apparent individuality of the generative 
organ -
It cannot be too carefully borne in mind - that 
zoological<s>ly <\s> individuality - and that the whole 
question of the propriety of the <s>[text?]<\s> “Alternation Theory “ as a means 
of colligating the facts (for at best it can be nothing more )
turns upon the nature and amount of this
difference 
[one piece of text overwriting another]
the “Alternation Theory “ becomes unnecessary 
In accordance with this definition neither 
Salpa A nor Salpa B would be individuals 
T.O. to p.44
